venue.title: Venue
venue.description: Grand Hyatt Incheon is strategically located at the gateway of Korea minutes away from the Incheon International Airport and is also surrounded by local attractions like Wangsan and Eurwang-ri beaches.

infos.val:

321 Beon-gil, Jung-gu, Incheon,
South Korea, 22382
